-	script	pcMOB	-1,{

OnInit:
	//Configuracion
	setarray $mobs[0],1096,1388,1839,1582,1120,2131,1511,1647,1785,1630,1399,1039,1874,2068,1272,1719,
	1046,1389,1112,1115,1957,1492,1929,1418,1871,1252,1768,1086,1688,1646,1373,1147,1059,1150,1956,2022,1087,1190,1038,1157,1159,1502,
	1623,1650,1583,1708,1312,1751,1685,1648,1917,1658,1832; end;

OnNPCKillEvent:	for (set .@i, 0; .@i < getarraysize($mobs); set .@i, .@i + 1) {	if(killedrid == $mobs[.@i]) getitem 7539,2; } end; }
